title: BYO: spiked
creator_credit: Eric Mival and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
brief_description: One of a series of films following BYO. In this episode the attempts of some parents to allow moderate drinking at a party are thwarted by gatecrashers. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Mival and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
